mapper.insert: insert into `order`(id, delivery, status, create_date) values(#{id}, #{delivery}, 1, #{create_date, jdbcType=DATE})
insert into order_product(order_id, product_id, product_name, count) values(#{order_id}, #{product_id}, #{product_name}, #{count})
mapper.select: select t.id,t.delivery,t.status,t.create_date from `order` t where t.status = 2 and t.accept = #{accept} order by t.create_date desc, t.id
